full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice

**Project Title** : W0138-23A035-2 Military Air Shipping Container

**Reference Number** : WS4115843543-Doc4236277383

**Tender Details**

* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-06T14:00:00 (closed)
* **Nature of Tender**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contract Objectives**

The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of 1 military air shipping container, including delivery in Saguenay, Québec, Canada.

**Key Requirements**

The proposed container must meet the specifications outlined in the [Annex "Statement of Requirements"].

**Evaluation Criteria**

The selection will be based on the **Lowest Price** criterion.

**Tender Method**

Prospective contractors must express their interest and submit their proposals, in accordance with the instructions outlined in the Tender Notice available on the Ariba Discovery platform: 

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639022?extsite=MTc2MzkwMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639022?extsite=MTc2MzkwMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information**

For additional information or assistance, please contact: 

* Francois S Martineau, Senior Contracting Authority
* Phone: Not available
* Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* A/L Name: TP Government Contracting Authority
* Address: Various Options Available, Federal Government

**Closing Notice**

This solicitation has expired. Upon request, a debriefing or feedback session will be provided to offerors who submitted a proposal.
